title: Camperdown Park Walking Route

images.title: Mike Pennington / Parkland in Camperdown Park
images.caption: Parkland in Camperdown Park. Very traditional English parkland in the heart of Scotland.

images.title: Camperdown House by James Denham, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Camperdown House

images.title: Gwen and James Anderson / Out of Africa.
images.caption: Out of Africa. These two life~size sculptures of an African elephant and her calf, were created by Gail Van Heerden. The elephants are crafted from recycled metal, taken from boats which once sailed up the Tay.

images.title: Boating Pond, Camperdown Park. by edward mcmaihin, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Boating Pond

images.title: A peacock in Dundee Wildlife Centre by James Denham, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: A peacock in Dundee Wildlife Centre

images.title: stephen samson / Kings Cross Camperdown park Dundee
images.caption: Kings Cross

description: Explore 400 acres of parkland in this large country park in Dundee. The expansive grounds surround the 19th century neo-classical Camperdown House and contain 190 species of tree. There is also the Camperdown Wildlife Centre with two brown bears, lemurs, monkeys, owls and eagles. If you would like to extemd your walk you could head to the adjacent Clatto Country Park where you will find a large reservoir surrounded by peaceful woodland.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: Head north west from the park and you could visit the tranquil Lairds Loch and enjoy a climb to Northballo Hill in the lovely Sidlaw Hills. Near here is the village of Newtyle where you can pick up the Newtyle Railway Walk along the old Dundee and Newtyle Railway. To the south there's the popular Dudhope Park and Dundee Law where you can enjoy fine views over the city.

display_address: Liff Road, Myrekirk, Dundee, Dundee City, Alba / Scotland, DD2 4UT, United Kingdom
